title: Application header and sub-header
description: Implement header including primary meany and a search box. Also include the sub-header with the links

title: TCO calculator form
description: Implement the form as per the design. All the widgets should be choses as per designs. On submit form should get submitted to the API.

title: Form summary
description: Values presented in the summary should be in sync with values entered in the form. User should be able use submit only if form data is valid
